title: Kawhi watch, Kevin Durant, and villains in sports
itunes:title: Kawhi watch, Kevin Durant, and villains in sports
description:
Colin gives the latest news on Kawhi Leonard and which teams three teams are in the hunt. He talks about the latest story on Kevin Durant being unhappy with Golden State Warriors HC Steve Kerr and explains why the problem might be Durant. Also Colin ranks the top 10 villains in sports. Guests include Ric Bucher, Cuttino Mobley, Cousin Sal, Todd Fuhrman, and Jason McIntyre.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
